sessionCookie.title: Instagram Session Cookie (sessionid)
sessionCookie.description: Your Instagram session cookie (sessionid). Get it from browser DevTools > Application > Cookies > instagram.com > sessionid

accountType.title: Account Type
accountType.description: Select your account age/activity level to auto-set safe daily follow limits

action.title: Action to Perform
action.description: Choose whether to follow or unfollow users

maxFollowsPerRun.title: Max Actions Per Run
maxFollowsPerRun.description: Never exceed 50 actions in one run. Recommended: 5-10 (brand new), 10-15 (new), 15-25 (mature), 25-50 (aged)

delayBetweenFollows.title: Delay Between Actions (seconds)
delayBetweenFollows.description: Time to wait between actions to avoid detection. Recommended 30-60s, but can be 0 for fast runs

randomDelayVariation.description: Random variation to make activity look human. Recommended: 15-30 seconds
